rules_text:
Whenever Nue enters or is turned face up, manifest dread. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
When Nue dies, you may pay 3 life. When you do, manifest it, then shuffle your face-down cards.
